fpvscores-event-manager/add-location.title: Add Location
fpvscores-event-manager/add-location.description: Let's register your organisation on the FPVScores Platform.

fpvscores-event-manager/create-organisat.title: Create Organisation
fpvscores-event-manager/create-organisat.description: Let's register your organisation on the FPVScores Platform.

fpvscores-event-manager/upload-logo.title: Upload Logo
fpvscores-event-manager/upload-logo.description: Let's register your organisation on the FPVScores Platform.

fpvscores-sync-plugin/install.title: Install Plugin
fpvscores-sync-plugin/install.description: To add and run a plugin, place the plugin's entire directory in /src/server/plugins, and (re)start the server.

fpvscores-sync-plugin/settings.title: Setup Plugin Settings
fpvscores-sync-plugin/settings.description: The FPVScores Sync plugin houses a few settings. These are located under the FPVScores Sync section on the Format page within your RotorHazard server.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

pilots/change-avatar.title: Change Avatar
pilots/change-avatar.description: Personalize your FPVScores profile by uploading your avatar.

pilots/create-account.title: Create Account
pilots/create-account.description: The fun really starts after creating a pilot account on FPVScores.com.

pilots/pilot-card.title: Pilot Card
pilots/pilot-card.description: Set your ELRS Bindphrase and/or TBS Fusion MAC address in your account so it can be scanned into the Rotorhazard laptimer with your QR code. This allows the race director to send lap times to your goggles OSD.

pilots/set-pilot-osd.title: OSD Lap Times
pilots/set-pilot-osd.description: Set your ELRS Bindphrase and/or TBS Fusion MAC address in your account so it can be scanned into the Rotorhazard laptimer with your QR code. This allows the race director to send lap times to your goggles OSD.
